Articles.Content:
i cant connect Gemini small silver fuel tanks together. whats the trick? in my mind when something like this comes up in game, they could easily have a small popup that says " you need this first" or "cant connect more than one". something, anything is much better than wasting my limited time searching for things like this.

**Edited <time datetime="2015-04-30T10:01:01Z" title="04/30/2015 10:01  AM" data-short="9 yr">April 30, 2015</time> by KasperVld**
